com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
Interface IGameState

All Known Implementing Classes:
BattleState, EndState, GameState, LoginState
public interface IGameState

IGameState defines the interface for all types of game states that represent a particular stage of the game. It maintains and manages the associated scene graph for the game stage.

IGameState is constructed by Game and initialized by ITask. It is updated within the main update render loop every frame. However, it does not provide any direct rendering functionalities.

Version:
Creation date: 06-29-2008 15:35 EST, Modified date: 07-17-2008 12:06 EST

Yi Wang (Neakor)
